definition: to put on or wear (glasses, hat, gloves etc)/to respect/to bear/to support
to love and respect/love and respect
Beidaihe district of Qinhuangdao city 秦皇島市|秦皇岛市[Qin2 huang2 dao3 shi4], Hebei
Dai Bingguo (1941-), a Chinese politician and professional diplomat
Charles De Gaulle (1890-1970), French general and politician, leader of the Free French during World War II and president of the Republic 1959-1969
to wear a hat/(fig.) to stigmatize/to be branded as
lit. to put Zhang's hat on Li's head/to attribute sth to the wrong person (idiom)/to confuse one thing with another

sentences.english: How do you like the hat which Grace has on today?
sentences.chinese: 你觉得葛雷丝今天戴的帽子如何？

sentences.english: The woman with a large hat on her head is beautiful.
sentences.chinese: 冠词，顾名思义，就是戴在名词头上的一顶帽子。

sentences.english: He sported a pair of brass earrings.
sentences.chinese: 他的耳朵上戴着一副铜耳环。

sentences.english: The scout with shoulder-straps shouted on the outermost route as a routine.
sentences.chinese: 戴肩章的侦查员按例在最核心的线路上叫嚷。

sentences.english: He persists in wearing that old-fashioned hat.
sentences.chinese: 他坚持要戴那顶旧帽子。

sentences.english: Use rubendr gloves to wash dishes.
An official tie, worn without tiepin.
sentences.chinese: 正式领带且不戴领带夹。

sentences.english: A band worn around the head.
If you have no jewellery, can't you wear a flower instead.
sentences.chinese: 如果没有首饰的话，就不能戴朵花吗？

sentences.english: She was wearing a string of cheap pearls about her neck.
sentences.chinese: 她脖子上戴着一串廉价的珍珠。

sentences.english: I hope you ride my bike without a helmet and get hit by a monster truck.
sentences.chinese: 我希望你骑我的自行车时没戴头盔被一辆泥头车撞死。

sentences.english: I read newspaper, is wearing a Presbyopia mirror.
sentences.chinese: 我看书报时，是戴了老花眼镜。

sentences.english: This is full stroke swimming with a front-mount snorkel.
sentences.chinese: 这是戴呼吸管的完整划臂动作。

sentences.english: I can't feel anything through these gloves.
sentences.chinese: 我戴著手套什么都摸不出来。

sentences.english: In order to prevent sand getting in my eyes, I wear a pair of sun-glasses.
sentences.chinese: 为了防止沙子迷眼，我戴上了一副墨镜。

definition: to wear a hat/(fig.) to stigmatize/to be branded as
to put on/to wear (mouthguard, contact lenses, hearing aid etc)
to wear (as accessories)/carry at the waist
